value:
There's no shortage of sparring
partners with so many strong Heroes
around. But just once...$k$pI'd like to spar with you.

I was training soldiers back in my
world, but they perished when the Fell
Dragon attacked.$k$pJust like my mother and father...

You aren't a fighter? Well, I can train
you if you'd like. To start... Sprint to
that mountain in the distance.

Would you mind if I took a closer look
at the Order of Heroes uniforms?$k$pThat lovely design on the back
reminds me of a feather.

If I have free time, I have time to train.
I won't let anyone else die on my
watch... I must protect them.

Are you $Nu?
I've come with greetings. Before I go,
how about a quick spar?

These are the results I need
to win on the battlefield.

I'll not settle for this... But it's
a start.

This will not do... I need to train
more.

Through training, I hope to meet
a whole new me.

I'm Kjelle, Sully's daughter. My mother
was an incredible knight... And one
day, I'll be just as strong.

Who's there? Oh, it's you. I wasn't
expecting to see you here. All done
with your daily tasks?$k$pYou sure know how to keep busy. I
was just training, myself. There just
aren't enough hours in the day for it...$k$pI must become stronger, both
physically and mentally. That way I'll
be ready to face any challenge.$k$pI was uneasy when I first arrived here.
I have unfinished business back
home, you see. But...$k$pYou've been helping me become
stronger. So while I'm here, your
ways are my own.$k$pYour will is more determined than
that of anyone else. Only you can
guide us to victory.
せやっ！
えぇい！
ううっ！
I was...careless...
This'll do it!
Victory is mine.
One step closer...
Don't forget me!
Defeat... How cruel.
Yeah.
I have no interest in weaklings.
I must become stronger. Some day, I will take back everything I lost.
You're telling me you don't spar with the Heroes you've summoned?
I don't need to get all gussied up. I'm a soldier.
Wearing a suit of armor calms me. You should try it too.
Father, Mother. If I said I missed you, would you laugh at me?
I'll show you that I can protect you. I lost someone important to me before. Never again.
Let's go!
To victory!
I'm with you.
